00014 #define DISCOUNT 0.6
00015 #define STEP_SIZE 0.001
00016 #define STEPS_PER_EPOCH 1000
00017 #define MAX_STEPS 0  // 0 is no max
00018 #define MAX_TIME 0   // 0 is no max
00019 #define NN_LAYERS 2 // includes input dimension and output dimension
00020 #define PARAM_FILE "crf.params"
00021 #define MAX_RAND_PARAM 0.00
00022 #define APPROX_OUTPUTS 1
00023 #define GRID_SIZE 3
00024 #define PACKET_GEN_PROB 0.5
00025 #define BUFFER_SIZE 10

00027 int main_crf(int argc, char** argv) {
00028 
00029     int stepsPerEpoch = STEPS_PER_EPOCH;
00030 
00031     GridSim* simulator = new GridSim(GRID_SIZE, PACKET_GEN_PROB, BUFFER_SIZE);
00032    
00033     // Create all the independent agents.
00034     // Change this for true CRF code.
00035     FactoredController::Controllers controllers;
00036     for (int a=0; a < simulator->getAgents(); a++) {
00037         controllers.push_back(new BinaryController(new NeuralNet(simulator->getObsRows(), 1)));
00038     }
00039 
00040     // First true is to split the observation, second is to say global rewards not local
00041     OLPomdp learner(new FactoredController(controllers, true, false), 
00042                     simulator, 
00043                     DISCOUNT, 
00044                     STEP_SIZE
00045                     );
00046 
00047 
00048     // This code should not be changed for true CRF code.
00049 
00050     //learner.read(PARAM_FILE);
00051     learner.saveBest(PARAM_FILE);
00052     learner.useAutoBaseline = false;
00053 
00054     time_t startTime = time(NULL);
00055     learner.learn(stepsPerEpoch, MAX_TIME, MAX_STEPS);
00056 
00057 
00058     cout<<"Took "<<time(NULL) - startTime<<" secs\n";
00059 
00060     return 0;
00061 
00062 }
